    • Method Detail

      • getAppkey

        java.lang.String getAppkey()
        Returns:
        the App Key

      • getAppSecret

        java.lang.String getAppSecret()
        Returns:
        the App Secret

      • getAccessToken

        java.lang.String getAccessToken()
        Returns:
        the current access token

      • getExpiresIn

        java.util.Date getExpiresIn()
        Returns:
        the date of expire for access token

      • getScope

        java.lang.String getScope()
        Returns:
        the session scope: scope separated by space

      • getRestClient

        RestUtils getRestClient()
        Returns:
        the HTTP Rest Client

      • getHeaders

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getHeaders()
        Returns:
        headers for http request with session parameters

      • addScope

        void addScope(java.lang.String scope)
        Right to be granted by the user for an Api. Each Api can populate scope. For example, Cloud Api add 'cloud' scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope for identity populate by an Api.

      • isLinked

        boolean isLinked()
        Returns:
        whether or not this session has a user's access token is still valid.

      • unlink

        void unlink()
        Unlinks the session by removing any stored access token and secret.

      • refresh

        void refresh(OrangeListener.Success<java.lang.String> success,
             OrangeListener.Error failure)
        Refresh a session thanks to refresh token
        Parameters:
        success - Listener called when session has been refreshed
        failure - Listener called when error occurred
